items.sentence: Tom came to Boston soon after graduating from high school.
Tom can still recite a poem he wrote when he was thirteen.
Do you know why Tom doesn\'t want to go to Boston with us?
Do you think that we\'ll have a white Christmas this year?
When you get to be my age, you\'ll understand what I mean.
My daughter often had asthma attacks when she was a child.
Tom is doing very well considering his lack of experience.
I know that Tom and Mary are planning to do that together.
Tom hopes he doesn\'t become a workaholic like his father.
Tom is a smart child. He\'s the best student in his class.
